Literature Review: The COVID-19 pandemic has had profound and multifaceted impacts on financial markets, household behavior, and economic stability. This literature review synthesizes key findings from recent studies to provide a comprehensive understanding of the financial implications of the pandemic. The review is structured around the themes of financial market dynamics, epidemiological models, financial stability, household behavior, and fixed income markets.
